page.title: 12TOM BARRON FARMS LIMITED
page.content: Tom Barron used to be very famous in the U.S.A.,India and Africa .Tom Barron died on Thursday ,October 6th 1955.When Tom died he was 83 years old.His name is still carried on by farms going under his name.These are some farms in the Catforth area: Whinneyfield, Ambrose, Bartle, Catforth Hall and Swillbrook. These are farms in other areas: Warton and Freckleton. There are also two others in Catforth: Miller lane which rears 60,000 hens to 18 weeks old. The other is Chapel lane where they breed 10,000 every year . Altogether Tom Barron Farms Limited hatch 10 million every year. 5 million are female 5 million are male. They sex them by their colour.
